vo-dml:model.name: voprov
vo-dml:model.description: Data model describing the structure and content of the IVOA Provenance Data Model. This re-uses the concepts from the W3C Provenance DM, but extends it with a description layer for Activities and Entities. The « voprov » name has ben choosen to avoid clashing with W3C « prov » namespace
vo-dml:model.title: Provenance Data Model
vo-dml:model.author: Servillat Mathieu, Riebe Kristin, Boisson Catherine, Bonnarel François, Galkin Anastasia, Louys Mireille, Nullmeier Markus, Renault-Tinnaci Sanguillon Michèle, Streicher Ole

primitiveType.name: VotableFieldFormat
primitiveType.description: Field format as defined in the VOTable specification

enumeration.name: AgentType
enumeration.description: A literal for specifying the Agent type : Individal or Organisation or SoftwareAgent

literal.name: Person
literal.description: Type label for agents considered as persons

literal.name: Organization
literal.description: Type label for agents considered as organizations

literal.name: SoftwareAgent
literal.description: Type label for agents considered as software agents

objectType.name: Agent
objectType.description: A person or an organisation that was involved in the follow-up of an Activity, or can be credited for the production of an Entity.

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: Unique identifier for an Agent. Must be unique in the domain.

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: Agent name

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: Defines the Agent type : Person, Organization or SoftwareAgent

attribute.name: comment
attribute.description: A text about some peculiar information on the instance.

attribute.name: email
attribute.description: Email address of the Agent

attribute.name: affiliation
attribute.description: Agent's affiliation

attribute.name: phone
attribute.description: Agent's phone number

attribute.name: address
attribute.description: Agent's postmail address

attribute.name: url
attribute.description: Reference URL to the agent

objectType.name: WasAssociatedWith
objectType.description: Denotes the assignment of responsibility to an agent for an activity.

attribute.name: role
attribute.description: Function of the agent with respect to the activity

objectType.name: WasAttributedTo
objectType.description: Links an Agent to the Entity it is responsible for. Various roles for this relation are allowed and defined in the Provenance vocabulary under TypeOfAgentRole

attribute.name: role
attribute.description: Function of the agent with respect to the entity.

objectType.name: Activity
objectType.description: A task executed at some time. It consumes products via relations of type Used and produces results via relations of type WasGeneratedBy. The method applied for this task is described in the ActivityDescription class and its subtree.

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: Unique identifier for an Activity. Must be unique in the domain.

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: Activity name

attribute.name: startTime
attribute.description: This allows to know when the activity was launched . This is might help to check dependencies and errors into the database.

attribute.name: endTime
attribute.description: Time when the Activity ends up.

attribute.name: comment
attribute.description: A text about some peculiar information on the instance.

composition.name: wasAssociatedWith
composition.description: Gathers Agents bound to this Activity instance

composition.name: used
composition.description: Gathers Entities used by the Activity instance

composition.name: wasConfiguredBy
composition.description: Gathers Configuration elements for this Activity instance

reference.name: informant
reference.description: refers to an activity providing information

reference.name: activityDescription
reference.description: Points to the corresponding description class

objectType.name: Used
objectType.description: Binds an Activity to the Entities it consumes .

attribute.name: role
attribute.description: function of the entity with respect to the activity

attribute.name: time
attribute.description: Time at which the usage of an entity started

reference.name: usageDescription
reference.description: This link points to some description of the Usage in the context of one specific ActivityDescription.

objectType.name: Entity
objectType.description: A thing which is consumed or produced in a task , namely here in the astronomical domain. It represents some data as single element or file or an instrument.

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: Unique identifier for an Entity. Must be unique in the domain.

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: This is a text string which designate the Entity for display in application or diagrams . It can follow various syntax and naming conventions depending on the Entity subclass : dataset, quality flag, device name convention, etc .

attribute.name: location
attribute.description: A path, a URL, coordinates or the name of a place.

attribute.name: generatedAtTime
attribute.description: The time and date of generation for the entity. The format is chosen by the provider e.g. ISO 8601

attribute.name: invalidatedAtTime
attribute.description: Date and time of invalidation of the entity. After that date, the entity is no longer available for any use.

attribute.name: comment
attribute.description: A text about some peculiar information on the instance.

composition.name: wasGeneratedBy
composition.description: Binds to the activity which generated this entity

composition.name: wasAttributedTo
composition.description: Gathers Agents to which the entity was attributed

reference.name: usedEntity
reference.description: The link from the progenitor Entity to its descendant.

reference.name: entityDescription
reference.description: Link to the corresponding EntityDescription instance. Many Entities may share the same EntityDescription instance.

objectType.name: WasGeneratedBy
objectType.description: Binds an Entity to the Activity that produced it as a result.

attribute.name: role
attribute.description: Function of the entity with respect to the activity.

reference.name: activity
reference.description: points to the creating Activity instance.

reference.name: generationDescription
reference.description: Points to the instance of GenerationDescription describing this kind of generated output.

objectType.name: Collection
objectType.description: A collection of Entities. It is a way to consider a set of entities when produced and consumed with respect to an Activity. Allows coarse description of the provenance.

reference.name: entity
reference.description: Binds a collection entity to its members

objectType.name: ValueEntity
objectType.description: An entity that only contains a value. The way to interpret this value is described in the ValueDescription instance it linked to.

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: The value of the Entity.

objectType.name: DatasetEntity
objectType.description: An Entity which represents a data file in the Provenance system. It is not the data file itself

objectType.name: ActivityDescription
objectType.description: Gives further information on how an activity works internally.

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: Instance name

attribute.name: version
attribute.description: Version number, if applicable

attribute.name: description
attribute.description: A descriptive text for this kind of activity

attribute.name: docurl
attribute.description: Link to more documentation

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: type of the activity

attribute.name: subtype
attribute.description: More specific subtype of the activity

composition.name: parameterDescription
composition.description: Gathers the description classes explaining the Parameter object that can be applied when running an Activity that can follow this ActivityDescription template.

composition.name: configFileDescription
composition.description: Gathers the description of the config files

composition.name: usageDescription
composition.description: This link points to some description of the Usage in the context of one specific ActivityDescription.

composition.name: generationDescription
composition.description: This link points to some description of the results produced in the context of one specific ActivityDescription.

objectType.name: UsageDescription
objectType.description: This class gathers description features about the products an ActivityDescription considers as input resources. It can differentiate various roles and types of Entities consumed by the task described by the corresponding ActivityDescription instance.

attribute.name: role
attribute.description: Function of the entity with respect to its usage by the activity.

attribute.name: description
attribute.description: A descriptive text for this kind of usage

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: type of the usage. It is a free text attribute with some reserved words

attribute.name: multiplicity
attribute.description: Number of expected input entities to be used with the given role. The string syntax is similar to that of VO-DML in the form ‘minOccurs..maxOccurs” or a single value if minOccurs and maxOccurs are identical.

reference.name: entityDescription
reference.description: Points to the description of the used entities

objectType.name: GenerationDescription
objectType.description: This class gathers description features about the products an ActivityDescription considers as output results.

attribute.name: role
attribute.description: A label that describes the function of what was produced. It is defined in the context of an ActivityDescription instance.

attribute.name: description
attribute.description: A descriptive text for this kind of entity generation

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: Type of the entity generation. It is a free text attribute with some reserved words

attribute.name: multiplicity
attribute.description: Number of expected input entities to be generated with the given role. The string syntax is similar to that of VO-DML in the form ‘minOccurs..maxOccurs” or a single value if minOccurs and maxOccurs are identical.

reference.name: entityDescription
reference.description: Points to the description of the used entities

objectType.name: EntityDescription
objectType.description: This class is meant to store descriptive information for different categories of entities.

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: Instance name

attribute.name: description
attribute.description: A descriptive text for this kind of entity

attribute.name: docurl
attribute.description: Link to more documentation

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: Type of the entity

objectType.name: ValueDescription
objectType.description: Description of the properties of a ValueEntity.

attribute.name: valueType
attribute.description: VOTable compliant data type of the parameter value

attribute.name: unit
attribute.description: VO unit string

attribute.name: ucd
attribute.description: VO-compliant UCD string

attribute.name: utype
attribute.description: Role of the value in the context of an external VO data mode

objectType.name: DatasetDescription
objectType.description: The description of a DatasetEntity. Can be pointed to by multiple instances of DatasetEntity.

attribute.name: contentType
attribute.description: MIME-type or format of the dataset

package.name: ActivityConfiguration
package.description: This package gathers the necessary classes for expressing the configuration of a task before, during and after execution. We consider only the executed version will be stored in a provenance information system.

enumeration.name: TypeOfConfigArtefact
enumeration.description: The configuration for an Activity ( job) can be fully explicit , with a list of searchable parameters , or expressed into a document file storing the configuration . This attribute contains the type of config information at the end of the wasConfiguredby association instance .

literal.name: Configfile
literal.description: Label for config file config artifact

objectType.name: ParameterDescription
objectType.description: How to both use and interpret the parameter

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: Name of the parameter

attribute.name: valueType
attribute.description: VOTable compliant data type of the parameter value

attribute.name: unit
attribute.description: VO unit string

attribute.name: ucd
attribute.description: Unified Content Descriptor, supplying a standardized classification of the physical quantity

attribute.name: utype
attribute.description: Expresses the role of the parameter in the context of VO data mode text

attribute.name: min
attribute.description: Minimum parameter value as a string whose value can be interpreted by the valueType attribute

attribute.name: max
attribute.description: Maximum parameter value as a string whose value can be interpreted by the valueType attribute

attribute.name: default
attribute.description: Default parameter value as a string whose value can be interpreted by the valueType attribute.

attribute.name: options
attribute.description: array of possible values

attribute.name: description
attribute.description: A text that explains the content and purpose of this Parameter.

objectType.name: ConfigFileDescription
objectType.description: Properties of the configuration files

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: Name of the instance

attribute.name: contentType
attribute.description: MIME-type or format of the configuration file

attribute.name: description
attribute.description: A text that explains the content and purpose of the configuration file.

objectType.name: Parameter
objectType.description: A simple value which is part of the configuration of an activity instance

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: The value of the parameter. The data type, meaning, units, etc., are stored in the ParameterDescription instance bound to it.

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: Name of the parameter

reference.name: valueEntity
reference.description: A Parameter instance can have a value derived from a ValueEntity value element computed previously by some former Activity instance. Therefore, the ValueEntity it refers to is generated with another instance of the Activity class, in a different generation scenario executed previously. This references such a ValueEntity from the Parameter instance.

reference.name: parameterDescription
reference.description: Gathers the properties and the description of the Parameter instance.

objectType.name: ConfigFile
objectType.description: The values used to control the activity can be provided as a Configuration file document.

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: Name of the file

attribute.name: location
attribute.description: Path or URL to the config file

attribute.name: comment
attribute.description: text containing comments on the config file

reference.name: configFileDescription
reference.description: Points to the corresponding description class

objectType.name: WasConfiguredBy
objectType.description: This is an association class binding an Activity Instance to one configuration artefact which can be a Parameter instance or a ConfigFile instance . Attribute "artefactType" holds the type of its target .

attribute.name: artefactType
attribute.description: Object type pointed by the instance
